ValidationRule.description: It is an error if Card Type (Control) is either "Driver & Vehicle" , "Driver Only" or "Trade" AND Driver Name is empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(AU_Drivers_Name__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(AU_Card_Type__c, 'Driver Only'), ISPICKVAL(AU_Card_Type__c, 'Driver & Vehicle'), ISPICKVAL(AU_Card_Type__c, 'Trade') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Driver Name must be entered if Driver chosen in Card Type (Control)
